ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The human postnatal TEC line was kindly provided by Dr. Maria Luiza Tor√≠bio (Universidad Autonoma de Madrid, Madrid, Spain). The mouse monoclonal 4G2 antibody (anti-flavivirus) was gently provided by the Laboratory of Monoclonal Antibody Technology from Bio-Manguinhos (Oswaldo Cruz Foundation, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil). The authors thank Raquel de Souza Martins for confocal analysis assistance. This work was funded by Brazilian Funding Agency for Studies and Projects (FINEP) #01.16.0078.00; Brazilian National Council for Scientific and Technological Development (CNPq) ATRV supported by #303170/2017-4, WS by #306699/2018-4, DAMC by #307720/2016-0; Carlos Chagas Filho Foundation for Funding Research in the State of Rio de Janeiro (Faperj) ATRV supported by #E-26/202.826/2018; the Oswaldo Cruz Foundation (Fiocruz) and National Laboratory for Scientific Computation; Coordination of Superior Level Staff Improvement (CAPES) - Brazil - Finance Code 001 and GLM, JBC and LWPA supported #23038.010041/2013-13; Mercosur Fund for Structural Convergence (FOCEM, Mercosur #03/11) and the Program of Preventing and Combating the Zika Virus, MCTIC/FNDCT - CNPq/MEC-CAPES/MS-Decit (Grants 426767/2018-7 and 88881.130684/2016-01 for MCB). This work was developed in the framework of the Brazilian National Institute of Science and Technology on Neuroimmunomodulation (INCT-NIM) WS supported by #465489/2014-1.
